comment: AJ gave me a bottle in 2015. Strong stuff!
Strong. Best with a drop of water

Classic nose, sweet and leather notes. Slightly astringent on the tongue. Nutty on the mid palate. Big flavors - salty, smoky, and sweet. But there are some nuances as well. Smooth at first but the warmth definitely creeps in, after a few sips your chest will heat up. Slight bitterness at the end. 1/21/18
